gemini_config.system_instruction: I want you to act as a fancy title generator. I will type keywords via comma and you will reply with fancy titles. my first keywords are api,test,automation

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I want you to act as a fancy title generator. I will type keywords via comma and you will reply with..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
